predicate.note: Frames file for 'disregard' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: never mind

example.name: whatEVER
example.text: However, traders disregarded a potential production disruption in Chile and a continued drop in inventories.
example.arg: a potential production disruption in Chile and a continued drop in inventories

roleset.note: Another verb with no relation to its morphological antonym.
